attributes.action: Give the public better protection from protestors who break the law
attributes.background: A lot of people have been unable to get to work because of protestors and public services have been adversely affected

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure how you'd like people to be better protected from protesters and in which circumstances.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
